Base:Descriptions.Base:Description: http://www.starkeys.com/painting1.jpg
busy harbor

A busy and dusty harbor, with ships moored to the piers. People bustle around intent upon their duty, and hawkers cry out their offers while slaves carry draped litters through the dusty streets. The waves sweep calmly in over the white beach, where seagulls cry and dive into the ocean in search of food. There is a yellow birch door to the northeast which leads into the old trade house, and a winding path leading to the palace to the west.
A busy harbor.
A busy and dusty harbor bustling with activity. There is a yellow birch door to the northeast which leads into the old trade house, and a winding path leading to the palace to the west.
http://www.starkeys.com/painting1s.jpg
yellow birch door leading into an old trade house
A domed yellow birch door leads into the old trade house. People can often be seen milling in and out with their arms full of goods.
A domed yellow birch door leads into the old trade house. People can often be seen milling in and out with their arms full of goods.
winding path leading to the palace
I'm too tired to think of words.
the dusty hot air
The air is full of dust, dry and hot and makes your lips parch.
Hot dusty air surrounds this area.
the shore

A white sandy shore, capaciously spread out. An occasional scattered hunk of driftwood juts from the sand like odd teeth guarding clumps of blue-green seaweed. Here and there multicolored shells peek out from their home embedded in the sand. Further in is a smattering of palms, and coconut trees, varying in size, while low growing red and green ferns shroud the area, keeping its secrets for themselves. Under the piers flood water swivels around the pillars.
A white sandy shore, littered from recent storms.
old workshop

A large open air building where men work even in stormy weather. Various pieces of ship parts are being planed and set here, massive lengths of planking being bowed with heat and heavy stone. A large rolled up canvas lies abandoned on the side of the building.
An old white stucco workshop.
sand dune
A drift of sand has piled here, creating a slight obstruction of view, perhaps good to hide behind.
A drift of sand has piled up into an impressive dune.
some flood water
Ankle deep flood water looks dangerous on many levels. The fast moving water has a good change of sweeping your feet from under you and the debris could probably hurt you if it bumps into you.
Ankle deep flood water is flowing on the ground. It's best to avoid the debris.
some piers

Several well constructed piers extend out over the water from the board walk. Posts drive deep into the water keeping the pier aloft as the waves roll in. Ships of many origins are moored to the piers. Large traders, small dug-outs, slave ships, a couple of warships and others of unknown purpose.
Several well constructed piers extend out over the water from the board walk.
unmanned vessel

A three master ship, smallish in size but a ship nonetheless. It's bow freshly cured and visibly clean, it is clearly a new vessel. Large white sails rest unmolested, bound high in the rigging. Three demi-culverin are visible above deck.
An unmanned ship, quietly resting in the bay with only a few guards.
crimson ship

A large two masted vessel, with a noticeable compliment of heavy cannons. The bulky crimson ship lurches now and then with passing waves as men load heavy crates and large kegs of powder into the hold.
A large crimson ship, with a noticeable compliment of heavy cannons.
the sandy ground
The ground, or a piece of it anyhow. Its covered in sand and not all that impressive.
A section of solid ground, covered in sand.
slave ship

Tied to one of the piers rests a dark and foreboding slave ship. Rank after rank of slaves are being herded on board by brutally looking overseers swinging whips. Soft cries and screams escape the slaves as the whips connect with their backs, they stumble up the gang-plank. Several nasty looking guards are overseeing the proceedings, while a small crowd of people stand off to the side staring at the ship with tears running down their cheeks.
A slave ship.
the sun
The sun is burning down from a clear blue sky, scorching unprotected skin with its rays.
shimmering ocean

A shimmering mass of gleaming azure water, crisp and clear, rolling waves breaking distantly and drawing gently over the shore. In the shallows many exotically colored fish swim and play, darting here and there among the vibrant orange and red coral.In the distance the daunting shadows of larger creatures lurch slowly along, and an occasional tell tale fin breaks the surface as it streaks through the water before disappearing again.
A shimmering mass of rolling azure water.
old trade house
A large building with open shutters and people milling in an out. It's clearly a place of trade and commerce.
An old white trade house.
trade ship

A three master ship, large and bulky in size. Large white sails rest unmolested, bound high in the rigging. Slaves carry bales of wares up the gangplank, while sailors are readying the ship for departure.
A large bulky trade ship is moored to one of the piers.
the weather
The weather is hot and dusty, no wind moving and the sun is scorching down from a clear blue sky.
The weather is hot and dusty, no wind moving and the sun is scorching down from a clear blue sky.

Core:Properties.Core:Property: X[S] \{Hot dust swirls through the air, making it hard to breathe.\|The sun burns down from a clear blue sky, and there's not a cloud in sight.\|The hustle and bustle of the harbor fills the air, drowning out regular conversation.\|A couple of children run through the crowd, as an angry shop-keep shouts after them.\|Hawkers cry out, offering all sorts of things to buy.\|A rare breeze swirls up some dust, but doesn't bring any relief from the heat.\|Seagulls cry out high above communicating their hunger and disapproval.\|The sound of the surf is carried over the sandy ground in gentle roars and splashes.\|Hot dust is regularly swirled up by the passing people causing the air to be difficult to breathe.\|A hot scorching sun makes any exposed skin burn with ease.\|Sweat runs down between your shoulder blades and other unmentionable areas as the heat creeps swiftly over you.\}

X[S] \{The soft steps of a servant echoes between the walls.\|The calls of a guard are heard from the outside.\|The crack of a whip cuts through the quietness of the afternoon.\|A light breeze makes nearby curtains flutter.\|Voices from children playing can be heard in the distance.\|A slave with a big feather fan works in silence as his body glistens with sweat.\|A slave girl scurries by intent on some duty.\|The sound of armour echoes through the building.\|In the distance you hear the clangs of swordplay while a voice shouts encouragement.\|Distant noise outside hints at workers moving heavy cargo around.\|Soft murmurs are heard from the outside.\| Giggles are heard from the outside as a pair of young women pass behind the fluttering curtain, only a glimpse seen of them.\}

X[M] /* remove the scripts when the actor leaves the water area */ \$actor."merry:act-post:stance" = nil; \$actor."merry:act-post:approach" = nil; \$actor."merry:act-post:leave" = nil; \$actor."merry:act-post:place" = nil; \$actor."merry:act-post:zthrow" = nil;
/* and, just in case anyone still has these scripts */ \$actor."merry:act-pre:place" = nil; \$actor."merry:act-pre:zthrow" = nil; return TRUE;

X[S] \{Hot dust swirls through the air, making it hard to breathe.\|The sun burns down from a clear blue sky, and there's not a cloud in sight.\|The hustle and bustle of the harbor fills the air, drowning out regular conversation.\|A couple of children run through the crowd, as an angry shop-keep shouts after them.\|Hawkers cry out, offering all sorts of things to buy.\|A rare breeze swirls up some dust, but doesn't bring any relief from the heat.\|Seagulls cry out high above communicating their hunger and disapproval.\|The sound of the surf is carried over the sandy ground in gentle roars and splashes.\|Hot dust is regularly swirled up by the passing people causing the air to be difficult to breathe.\|A hot scorching sun makes any exposed skin burn with ease.\|Sweat runs down between your shoulder blades and other unmentionable areas as the heat creeps swiftly over you.\}

X[S] \{The soft steps of a servant echoes between the walls.\|The calls of a guard are heard from the outside.\|The crack of a whip cuts through the quietness of the afternoon.\|A light breeze makes nearby curtains flutter.\|Voices from children playing can be heard in the distance.\|A slave with a big feather fan works in silence as his body glistens with sweat.\|A slave girl scurries by intent on some duty.\|The sound of armour echoes through the building.\|In the distance you hear the clangs of swordplay while a voice shouts encouragement.\|Distant noise outside hints at workers moving heavy cargo around.\|Soft murmurs are heard from the outside.\| Giggles are heard from the outside as a pair of young women pass behind the fluttering curtain, only a glimpse seen of them.\}
